items.sentence: I\'ve got an appointment tomorrow with Tom.
I\'ve just finished watching episode three.
I assumed it was Tom who wrote this report.
I blame Tom for what happened to all of us.
I went to the station to see my friend off.
I wiped the window sill with a paper towel.
I wish I could prevent that from happening.
I wish I could speak French as well as Tom.
I wish I could tell you something positive.
Have you ever eaten anything Tom\'s cooked?
A fire broke out in the middle of the city.
A glass of water will make you feel better.
A lot of people feel the same way Tom does.
A new bridge is being built over the river.
A tall building was built next to my house.
I know a place we can get something to eat.
I\'m sorry, but I already have other plans.
I\'m spending Christmas Eve with my family.
I\'m taking Tom to his favorite restaurant.
I\'ll go with you in case you need my help.
I\'m going to buy a camera for my daughter.
I just want to thank you for all your help.
I just want to wait for a few more minutes.
I just want you to know that I forgive you.
I just wanted to tell you how pleased I am.
I knew Tom would go to the dance with Mary.
This novel has been translated into French.
This poem was written by an anonymous poet.
This sort of work calls for great patience.
This suitcase is too heavy for me to carry.
I really do want to get to know you better.
This is the pool where Tom learned to swim.
Tom could hardly understand what Mary said.
Tom and Mary have never been close friends.
Tom and Mary have three wonderful children.
Tom and Mary have to get their car painted.
Tom and Mary hit it off from the beginning.
Tom and Mary hurried up the steps together.
The boy put a frog in the teacher\'s purse.
Can you recommend a good Korean restaurant?
Can you recommend a good hotel in the area?
Can you recommend a hotel near the airport?
Can you show me where you live on this map?
Tom is the one who deserves to be promoted.
Tom is the one who helped us the other day.
Tom is the one you should be worried about.
Tom is the only one I know who can do this.
Tom is the only one still in the classroom.
Don\'t cry. Crying doesn\'t solve anything.
You\'ve never told Tom the truth, have you?
